name: Sprite Jump (Pre-Alpha) Android
description:
Sprite Jump is a cool Platformer in which you jump from platform to platform in sprite land. In sprite land there is multiple levels in which you need to complete in order to complete the game! There is also slime guys you can jump on and coins to collect. This game is currently in Pre-Alpha which means there is way more to come. Hope you enjoy. 

Android Controls: On Screen Controls
